title: 123: Purgatorio: not just what a happy, Italian cat says
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: We've done Dante's Inferno before, so Thomas introduces us to his Purgatorio in this episode. Doesn't "Purgatorio" sound like the Italian version of famous horror movie "The Purge"? It isn't, though.
itunes:author: I dunno, but I' all like, whatev.
itunes:subtitle: (the cat's name is Meowl Pacino"
itunes:summary: We've done Dante's Inferno before, so Thomas introduces us to his Purgatorio in this episode. Doesn't "Purgatorio" sound like the Italian version of famous horror movie "The Purge"? It isn't, though.
